text: innama mathalu l-hayati l-dun'ya kamain anzalnahu mina l-samai fa-ikh'talata bihi nabatu l-ardi mimma yakulu l-nasu wal-anʿamu hatta idha akhadhati l-ardu zukh'rufaha wa-izzayyanat wazanna ahluha annahum qadiruna ʿalayha ataha amruna laylan aw naharan fajaʿalnaha hasidan ka-an lam taghna bil-amsi kadhalika nufassilu l-ayati liqawmin yatafakkaruna
